= merit | BrE ˈmɛrɪt, AmE ˈmɛrət | [[/wordsi|<-Back to List]] =
  
`优点/长处`

A.noun

① uncountable (of idea, philosophy, plan, behaviour) 价值 jiàzhí

▸ to see merit in sth/sb;

看到某物/某人的价值

▸ to have/lack merit

有/没有价值

▸ a person of merit

有美德的人

② uncountable (worth) 荣誉 róngyù

▸ to give (due) merit to sb for sth;

因某事归功于某人

▸ certificate of merit

奖状

③ countable (grade) 良好 liánghǎo

B.merits plural noun

(good points) 长处 chángchu

▸ to judge sb/sth on their/its own merits;

根据某人/某事本身的情况进行评判

C.transitive verb

值得 zhídé ‹mention, investigation, consideration›; 应得到 yīng dédào ‹reward, promotion›
